import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import{persistStore,persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import{thunk}from'redux-thunk';// Corrected import for redux-thunk
import rootReducer from'./reducers/index';const persistConfig={key:'root',storage};const persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);const composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;const store=createStore(persistedReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));const persistor=persistStore(store);export{store,persistor};
